In a clash, opponent has -3 Clash Power

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit is faster than the target, inflict [Burst] Count equal to their Speed difference (Max 5)

[WhenUse] Gain 1 [MDcFaBa]

[CanDuelGuard]
[BeforeUse] If this unit has 3 or more of both [MDcFaBa], [MDcFaBb] and [MDcFaBd], use the skill 'Furioso' instead

levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If the target has 10+ [Burst] and 2+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not consume target's [Burst] Count On Hit
[WhenUse] For every [MDcFaBa] on self, Base Power +1 (Max 3)
[WhenUse] For every [MDcFaBb] on self, Base Power +1 (Max 3)
[WhenUse] For every [MDcFaBd] on self, Base Power +1 (Max 3)

- Note, this skill has a total of 12 coins
levelList.name: Furioso!!!
